page.title: 19Population of Leverton
page.content: Leverton and its surroundings are not classed as a development area consequently not much building has taken place in the last twenty years. The population has remained at about six hundred for the past several hundred years.Young people tend to move away from the area in order to find work and seem no longer to marry within their own community.Older people are moving into the area to retire because in comparison with other parts of the country it is a very cheap place to live.Housing is generally not as expensive and people have ready access to fresh vegetables and are within easy reach of several large cities and the coast.
